name: Bowels of the Beast
description: Army General Alabastard McDanielson sold his soul to the Devil for a mere night of pleasures. Now he must pay the Devils fee by fighting his own mutated Army within the Devil's den! The Devil has pity on Danielson and gifts him two rusty Luger P08's that often jam when running and gunning. Time the enemies' attack, stand still and take aim................. you will find that one slug will decimate an enemy foe!!! What will become of Danielsons' soul??? Find out by battling through two left to right side scrolling levels of pure hell!
